citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 PM on
14-DEC-17.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer
